customer_journey.awareness: Discovery through Instagram before/after posts (38%), friend recommendations (29%), or Google searches for specific concerns (33%). Research phase averages 3-6 months with 50+ provider website visits

customer_journey.decision: Booking occurs within 14 days of consultation for 67% of clients, often triggered by limited-time pricing or appointment availability. Average decision involves checking financing options and reading final reviews
customer_journey.retention: First treatment to second averages 3-4 months, with membership programs achieving 85% retention. Clients typically expand from one service (Botox) to 3-4 services within first year
customer_journey.advocacy: Peak advocacy 2-4 weeks post-treatment when results are most visible. Average client refers 4.2 friends, with social media posts generating 8-15 inquiries per transformation share

viral_triggers.angle: Male aesthetic transformation series - 'Executive Refresh' showing professional men addressing tech neck, forehead lines, under-eye hollows with minimal treatments
viral_triggers.why: Massively underserved market, men share career-advancement content heavily, breaks stigma which drives conversation and shares, practical ROI angle (looking younger = career benefits) is highly shareable in professional networks

viral_triggers.angle: Treatment failure transparency - 'When Results Aren't Perfect' series showing how complications are handled, revision protocols, realistic expectations
viral_triggers.why: No competitor addresses this, fills major trust gap, controversy drives engagement, positions brand as honest authority, people share cautionary and educational content to help others, massive comment engagement from people sharing their own experiences
